title: How to Add Admin Commands to Your Roblox Place

steps.title: Open up the Roblox library and navigate to HD Admin.
steps.content: Open up the Roblox library and navigate to HD Admin. You can use other admins such as Adonis and Kuros. We are using HD Admin as it's open-source and the most up-to-date admin (as of 2019).

steps.title: Take a copy of the model by clicking the green Get button.
steps.content: Take a copy of the model by clicking the green Get button. Doing so will add the admin to your inventory.

steps.title: Head to the Create page (at the top-left of your screen).
steps.content: Head to the Create page (at the top-left of your screen). This will open up a list of your Games.

steps.title: Find the place for which you want to add admin commands.
steps.content: Find the place for which you want to add admin commands. If you do not have a place, click Create New Game and create your place.

steps.title: Click the Edit on the right-side of the game.
steps.content: Click the Edit on the right-side of the game. This will open up Roblox Studio for that game.

steps.title: In the topbar, click VIEW and load up the Explorer and Toolbox.
steps.content: In the topbar, click VIEW and load up the Explorer and Toolbox.

steps.title: In the Toolbox, navigate to Inventory.
steps.content: In the Toolbox, navigate to Inventory . This will load up the inventory we added the admin to.

steps.title: Click and drag HD Admin into your place.
steps.content: Click and drag HD Admin into your place. This will add the admin to your Explorer.

steps.title: Click FILE (in the upper-left corner of the window).
steps.content: Click FILE (in the upper-left corner of the window). A drop-down menu will appear.

steps.title: Select Publish to Roblox.
steps.content: Select Publish to Roblox . This will save the changes to your game.

steps.title: On your game's home page, press the green ► button.
steps.content: On your game's home page, press the green ► button.

steps.title: You now have admin commands in your game!
steps.content: You now have admin commands in your game! Type ;cmds (or :cmds if not HD Admin) to view the commands list. You can execute commands in-game by chatting. For example, ;explode me .
